name: Raving Rabbids: Travel in Time
overview: Raving Rabbids: Travel in Time is a party game for the Wii in which the titular Rabbids travel back in time using a washing machine. Its various co-operative and competitive mini-games can be played alone or with 2-4 players both online and offline. The game is centered around a museum from which the Rabbids Travel to different time periods and places. There are five main types of gameplay with a number of variations on each set in different locations and times. The games include flying, racing, fishing, shooting and 2.5D platforming.
